instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2915: What is 820-2915? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Blue Screen
threads.message:
Guys, 

I guess i have problem on the GPU, because sometimes  get a grey or blue screen.
I tested with ASD and passed. So, what could be the problem?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Blue Screen
threads.message: The usual. Replace GPU, but sourcing real new ones is hopeless at the moment.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Blue Screen
threads.message:
Thank You, Duke.
Could you please send the link for i try buy?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2915</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - Blue Screen
threads.message: There are none. Even 0809000 chips are either sold out or fake, hopeless.
